site_name: DRUMLIN FARM ED CENTER AND WILDLIFE SANCTUARY

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
A documented plan for environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds is not available for
review at the time of inspection. The plan must be species appropriate, approved by the attending veterinarian, and
address all elements required by this subpart. In order to assure the appropriate environmental enhancement for the
species being housed, a plan must be documented and followed.
To be corrected by documenting an appropriate plan for the environmental enhancement for birds by October 15th, 2023.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by November 28th, 2023 or the applicant will forfeit the
license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License
Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
A documented plan for environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds is not available for 
review at the time of inspection. The plan must be species appropriate, approved by the attending veterinarian, and 
address all elements required by this subpart. In order to assure the appropriate environmental enhancement for the 
species being housed, a plan must be documented and followed.  
 
To be corrected by documenting an appropriate plan for the environmental enhancement for birds by October 15th, 2023. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by November 28th, 2023 or the applicant will forfeit the 
license fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License 
Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
